author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct mousebite in case one has both mouebite and guard ring removal for HGCal silicon hits

#### PR validation:

Use scripts in SimG4CMS/Calo/test/python

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx339Z Correct mousebite in case one has both mouebite and guard ring removal for HGCal silicon hits
